Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Michigan
ShortDescription: NB 120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temp. rerouted via: Huron, Ontario, Upper Michigan and Wacker due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Huron, Fairbanks, Ontario, Upper Michigan and Wacker due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 75th/Coles
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp. rerouted NB: South Shore and 71st; SB: Exchange, 76th and South Shore: due to, street blockage near 75th/Coles.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 75th/Coles, due to street blockage near75th/Coles.

Northbound buses will operate via South Shore and 71st including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Exchange, 76th and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.
